mapper.insert: insert into category values(null, '기타', 'default category description', now(), #{id})
mapper.select: select a.no, a.name, count(b.no) as postCnt ,a.description, a.reg_date from category a left join post b on a.no = b.category_no where a.id = #{id} group by a.no order by a.no desc;
select no, name from category where id = #{id} order by no desc
